job.title: Data Engineer- Machine Learning
job.description:
Job Description
Should have very strong experience with 10+ Years .
Hands on Python experience in designing, developing microservices, REST APIs.
Solid hands on experience developing Python applications using libraries, IBM accelerators on Data Sciences/Client projects.
Experience using Python such as Flask, Django, etc.
Experience using microservices orchestration using frameworks such as AirFlow, etc."
